reviews.name: Zenith 4-Shelf Tension Caddy, Satin Nickel
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up. However when you read the directions it's a bit misleading. The short cylinder rod is needed when you set up for the tub edge. The instructions are reversed. But it didn't take a rocket scientist to figure it out.
reviews.title: Zenith 4-Shelf Tension Caddy, Stained Nickel

reviews.name: Zenith 4-Shelf Tension Caddy, Satin Nickel
reviews.reviewText: Good color, super useful, easy to install.
reviews.title: Super Useful

reviews.name: Zenith 4-Shelf Tension Caddy, Satin Nickel
reviews.reviewText: This is a real necessity for anyone who has a small bathroom and storage space is limited. It looks nice and is very sturdy. I'd definitely buy it again.
reviews.title: Exactly what we needed

reviews.name: Zenith 4-Shelf Tension Caddy, Satin Nickel
reviews.reviewText: This was a hassle to assemble. There should be a way to secure the poles together so that it doesn't fall apart during assembly. The spring was extremely hard to hold down which made installation difficult but holds caddy firmly in place. It looks beautiful when finally installed. Shelving holds up very well.
reviews.title: Hassle assembly & installation. Looks great.

reviews.name: Zenith 4-Shelf Tension Caddy, Satin Nickel
reviews.reviewText: My old shelf unit rusted. I'm hoping this one won't.
reviews.title: I need to wait to see how it lasts
